title: Halt and Catch Fire Season 1 - BDrip mp4 400p Computer Drama
description:
Halt and Catch Fire Season 1 - BDrip mp4 400p Computer Drama

The series' first two seasons are set in the Silicon Prairie of Texas, starting in 1983, and depicts a fictionalized insider's view of the personal computer revolution; however, the third season moves the setting to Silicon Valley.[3][4] The show's title refers to computer machine code instruction HCF, the execution of which would cause the computer's central processing unit to stop working ("catch fire" was a humorous exaggeration)
